title: Mathematics Skill Expertise Development Course Based on the 4C/ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level mathematics knowledge and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: A mathematics skill enhancement program applying the 4C/ID model (learning tasks, supportive information, part-task practice, coaching) in simulation/VR environments, providing continuous feedback through formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex mathematical problems using the 4C/ID modelâ€™s learning task structure to solve them with 80% or higher accuracy.

In a VR simulation environment (e.g., Unity-based physics simulation), learners will solve three real-world problems (e.g., bridge design, population growth prediction) through mathematical modeling. They will demonstrate the modeling process (variable definition, equation setup, validation) step-by-step and submit deliverables meeting peer and instructor evaluation criteria (4+ out of 5).
Learners can document a process of improving their problem-solving strategies three or more times based on peer coaching feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
